Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a three-dimensional multiplayer first-person shooter in which players are divided into two teams and fight against each other. The game features two teams: terrorists and special forces, and also contains several multiplayer game modes: normal and competitive mode (bomb clearance, hostage rescue), battle royale, war games (arms race, destruction of an object, flying snipers), fight to the death, mopping up, joint raid, teammates and sentinel. In the first scenario, the players playing for the terrorist team must plant a bomb at one of several points of the bookmark, and the special forces must successfully clear it. In the second scenario, the players from the terrorist team need to prevent the opposing team from rescuing the hostages they kidnapped.
